name: sociology-writing-suite
description: Complete academic writing toolkit for sociology research with 18 integrated skills. Use research-coordinator to orchestrate the full workflow, or invoke individual skills: Zotero integration (zotero for 43 MCP tools, zotero-rag for semantic search), literature review (lit-search, lit-synthesis, reading-agent, argument-builder), qualitative analysis (interview-analyst, interview-writeup), manuscript drafting (methods-writer, case-justification, interview-bookends), revision support (verifier, peer-reviewer, revision-coordinator, writing-editor), and skill creation (genre-skill-builder).
